# Data-SDK-Util

## 一. 使用方法

> 在 package.json 中配置

```json
"dependencies": {
    "data-sdk-util": "git+ssh://git@git.eefung.com/modules-nodejs/data-sdk-util.git#semver:4.2.*"
}
```

```js
import DistributeUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/distribute-util";
import ErrorCodeUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/error-code-util";
import IpUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/ip-util";
import LocalUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/local-util";
import RestUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/rest-util";
import SessionUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/session-util";
import SocketUtil from "data-sdk-util/lib/socket-util";
```
